s: May 2, 2025 - CCM Hockey is a Canadian brand of ice hockey equipment owned by Altor Equity Partners through its portfolio company Sport Maska Inc. The history of the brand traces to 1905, when Canada Cycle and Motor Limited, founded in 1899, began manufacturing hockey equipment as a secondary business.

t: Altor to partner with iconic hockey brand CCM Hockey | Altor
s: October 2, 2024 - STOCKHOLM/MONTREAL, October 2, 2024 – Altor Fund VI (“Altor”) has signed an agreement to acquire a significant majority stake in the iconic hockey brand CCM Hockey. CCM’s management will reinvest in the company. Altor will support CCM and existing management to accelerate and unlock ...
